Texts.Chs: 一颗奇特的恐龙蛋？！哇！但是我们可以用它来做什么呢？
Texts.Eng: A freakin' DINOSAUR EGG?!??! Wow! What can we do with it, I wonder?

Texts.Chs: 作为一种天然的酒精，甲醇有多种实验用途。如果你想要更多，可以从木料中萃取。
Texts.Eng: A natural alcohol, Methanol can be used in a variety of ways in your lab. You'll likely want a decent amount of it. You best get it from extracting wood.

Texts.Chs: 组织培养物是在涉及到遗传学中必不可少的实验材料，它会帮助你开拓全新的遗传学领域！
Texts.Eng: Absolutely essential in lab work involving genetics, tissue cultures open the gate to whole new areas of experimentation.

Texts.Chs: 多亏了高级塑料这种先进的有用材料，你可以展开更高级别的研究了。如果你想要更多的高级塑料，就多种点蕨树吧。
Texts.Eng: Advanced Plastic. You've opened up a whole new branch of research thanks to this helpful material. You will need quite a bit. Plant Bracken trees.

Texts.Chs: 好吧...我觉得你不应该碰从那个可怕生物身上掉下来的肉。不过，我觉得应该会派上用场的。
Texts.Eng: Allright...you probably shouldn't have touched this stuff. Flesh from that hideous beast. Ew. But I am positive it will be useful.

Texts.Chs: 如果你打算让你的作物产量提高，那么硝酸钙是必需的，它最主要的用处是可以制成肥料或杀虫剂。
Texts.Eng: Another essential element in pesticides and fertilizers, you'll need some of this stuff if you plan to have a profitable, viable farm.

Texts.Chs: 矿物原料可以从大多数石头中通过萃取获得。请尽可能地储存多一些。
Texts.Eng: Another staple ingredient in the lab, raw minerals can be easily obtained from most types of stone via extraction. Stockpile as much as possible.

Texts.Chs: 竹子在你的科学实验中并没有什么用处，不过它或许可以建个漂亮的林中小屋！
Texts.Eng: Bamboo will have little use in your lab, but it might just help you build a fancy jungle hut!

Texts.Chs: 磷酸铝是一种经提取后为实验提供直接好处的矿物。你所需要做的就是把它放入物质萃取器！
Texts.Eng: Berlinite is another extractable ore that provides direct benefits to your lab work. Place in your extractor and off you go!

Texts.Chs: 生化孢子有着发出生物荧光的能力，可以制作出许多方便实用的东西。快去试试吧！
Texts.Eng: Bio-spores have a great bioluminescent property that gives them some handy utility in your laboratory creations. Check it out!

Texts.Chs: 藻豆荚即可以作为生物燃料，那样会让你的星际旅行更为便捷，也可以作为有机物研究实验的对象。
Texts.Eng: Biofuel and organic research are two direct benefits to harvesting large amounts of algae. It can make all the difference in travel.

Texts.Chs: 当涉及到高端技术时，电路板是必需的。它可以制造出令人叹服的科学设备。
Texts.Eng: Circuitboards are somewhat essential when it comes to higher-end tech. Higher-end boards produce amazing machines.

Texts.Chs: 粘合剂可以称得上是实验室中的奇迹。它所能做的简直超越了科学，它可以把两种完全不一样分子结合在一起。
Texts.Eng: Corvex is sort of a laboratory miracle. It does things beyond science: it can bridge impossible elements together.

Texts.Chs: 氦-3既是燃料又是能源。当在大气层中时，它会呈现一种不寻常的效果，会让你的探索更为有趣。
Texts.Eng: Helium-3 is both a fuel and energy source. It also creates an unusual effect when in large clouds, leading to hilarity in exploration.

Texts.Chs: 氢气有着多方面的应用，但是你会发现它最适合于化学以及基因研究。
Texts.Eng: Hydrogen gas can be applied in a variety of ways, though you'll find it best suited in genetic research and chemistry.

Texts.Chs: DNA样本是萃取物中最常见的物质，但如果你想要进行大量的基因研究的话，那么你将需要成吨的DNA样本。
Texts.Eng: I'm sure it is obvious, but you're going to need tons of DNA Samples if you intend on doing a serious amount of genetics research.

Texts.Chs: 将这块金属塞进你的物质萃取器，然后看看有什么出来吧。我保证这会对你研究有所帮助的。
Texts.Eng: Jam this hunk of metal into your extraction lab and see what comes out. I guarantee you'll find it useful.

Texts.Chs: 甲基碘只有一种用途：制作杀虫剂。它会帮助你种在水栽托盘里的作物的！
Texts.Eng: Methyl Iodide has but one use, and that is in the creation of pesticides. These help with hydroponics trays, producing more valuable resources.

Texts.Chs: 备用零件或许是你多余的收集物中的其中一种，不过你是不是可以尝试把钨提炼出来？快来试试吧！
Texts.Eng: Miscellaneous pieces of metal may seem odd to collect until you consider the tungsten they can be extracted for. Try it. You'll see!

Texts.Chs: 快去你的实验设备上看看飞螳丝到底可以制作出什么吧，它一定会让你大吃一惊的。
Texts.Eng: Mutavisk silk woven into thread, ready for application in the lab. I think you'll be pleased with what it can do for you.

Texts.Chs: 氮气存在于任何地方，当然了，如果你没有找错地方的话。我想在研究中你会需要到大量氮气的。
Texts.Eng: Nitrogen can be found in abundance all over the place if you know where to look. You'll want a fair amount of it in your research.

Texts.Chs: 腐泥非常稀有，另外它也非常粘稠。不过你会发现它在化学研究上有着相当有趣的用途。
Texts.Eng: Putrid Slime is rare, and really quite gross. But, you'll find it has a few rather interesting uses through chemistry.

Texts.Chs: 营养糊由食物萃取的糊状物。它是实验室的主要原料，你会需要大量这种物质。
Texts.Eng: Raw, untarnished paste created from small samples of material. This is a staple in every lab, and you'll go through a ton of it.

Texts.Chs: 树脂是一种坚硬的物质，主要用于制作保护性护甲。
Texts.Eng: Resin is a hard substance that has applications primarily in protective gear.

Texts.Chs: 钠是一种普遍存在的物质，尤其在水中。它适用于绝大多数科学研究。
Texts.Eng: Salt is quite abundant (especially in water) and applied as a resource in numerous scientific branches.

Texts.Chs: 硝是一种方便的爆炸物，除此之外也可以应用于基因研究等科研方面。
Texts.Eng: Saltpeter is handy for explosives, and can be utilized in gene research and more besides.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;硅^reset;有着广泛的应用，我们主要将其用于制造微型芯片的设备。请多储备一些，你会需要到它们的。
Texts.Eng: Silicon has a range of uses, though for our purposes it will be used for technological devices such as microchips. Get more, you'll need it.

Texts.Chs: 丝绸是一种高品质的纺织品，有着许多广泛的应用。
Texts.Eng: Silk is a high quality textile that has many useful applications.

Texts.Chs: 绿色黏液看上去没什么用，实际上你可以在做出很多有趣的玩意儿。例如，一件由黏液制成的护甲？
Texts.Eng: Slimey goop may not seem useful, until you actually use some in a lab. Imagine, armor made of slime? It might come in handy...

Texts.Chs: 矿物样品是实验中不可或缺的材料。没有它，你将无法种植出高等植物。
Texts.Eng: Strictly for lab use, mineral samples none the less prove to be essential. Without them you'll be unable to produce advanced plant life.

Texts.Chs: 飞螳丝有着超强韧性，超高的可塑性以及可以抵抗所有辐射。看来你已经明白这种材料如果运用到护甲上是多么完美了吧！
Texts.Eng: Super tough, super malleable and utterly resistant to radiation of almost all sorts. Can you see how this is useful in clothing and armor?

Texts.Chs: 镁粉既可以用于制作先进基因，又可以活化极其稳定的粒子物质。
Texts.Eng: Take this magnesium powder and use it to create advanced genes, or to help destabilize otherwise completely stable particles.

Texts.Chs: 相信我，这一桶杀虫剂绝不是为了饮用而制造出来的。事实上，它的味道相当糟糕。但你可以使用它保护你的作物，让它更好的生长。
Texts.Eng: This barrel of pesticide is not for drinking. Trust me. Tastes awful. But you can use it in the creation and growth of amazing plants!

Texts.Chs: 遗传物质是你研究基因工程最关键的材料！
Texts.Eng: This sample of genetic material will prove to be an absolute necessity in your laboratory.

Texts.Chs: 真菌脓液，其实这种奇怪材料本质上就是由真菌构成的，它可以黏在任何有机物上。
Texts.Eng: This strange substance is fungal in nature, with a sort of sticky property that adheres to any organic matter.

Texts.Chs: 内胚层体型胶状物，这种物质相当诡异，但却很容易被塑形。这意味着由它所制成的各种道具都是非常奇怪的。
Texts.Eng: This stuff is bizarre, but can be shaped very specifically with relative ease. This means weapons, armor and equipment of a most odd sort.

Texts.Chs: 泡荚提取物这种材料真是让人又爱又恨，因为在提纯之前，它闻起来就像粪便一样臭，但它却有着各种特殊的用途。
Texts.Eng: This stuff is quite repulsive, actually. Blister Extract stinks like excrement before refinement, but has many exceptional uses.

Texts.Chs: 暗影气体会发出着强烈的恶臭，除了会减慢你的移动速度之外，还可能给你造成心理与免疫系统造成长期的损伤。
Texts.Eng: This vile gas really screws up your movement ability within it, and can cause long-term damage to the psyche and immune system.

Texts.Chs: 将这桶原油放入你的物质萃取器以增加你油的库存吧。
Texts.Eng: Toss this barrel of oil into an extractor to bolster your current stores of crude.

Texts.Chs: 主要用于医疗和农业练习。它还是一种非常有用的静脉药物添加剂，也是肥料的重要材料。
Texts.Eng: Used primarily in medical and agricultural practices. It makes for a very handy additive in some intravenous drugs, or soil enrichment from fertilizers.

Texts.Chs: 什...鬼...好吧。这是一种古老的技术，它似乎是被我直接触摸而启动了，它可以传授我古老的知识。
Texts.Eng: Wha...I...Okay then. This is some sort of ancient technology, and it appears to interface directly into whatever touches it. It teaches ancient knowledge!

Texts.Chs: 这到底是什么鬼东西？我们应该把它带回去好好研究研究。我敢打赌这玩意儿有着极高的价值。
Texts.Eng: What the heck is this thing? We should probably bring it to the lab to try it out. I bet it does something gross!

Texts.Chs: 谁不喜欢氧气呢？对吧，呼吸是最重要的事！但氧气除了可以用于呼吸之外还有更多用处。快去你的实验室里看看吧。
Texts.Eng: Who doesn't love oxygen, am I right? Breathing is great! But oxygen has many other uses. Poke around in your lab and see.

Texts.Chs: 有了碘，石墨烯、甲基碘和细胞材料才会变得更为简单。如果你遇到了，千万不要错过了！
Texts.Eng: With iodine handy, graphene, methyl iodide and cell material become relatively simple to produce. I'd collect as much as you can.

Texts.Chs: 有了皮革，你可以做出一些超棒的护甲保护你。或者你打算做一双雨靴好在下雨天时穿？
Texts.Eng: With leather, you can fashion some wonderful protection from harm or the elements. You'll probably want a bit of this for a rainy day.

Texts.Chs: 在不使用肥料的情况下，你将会为你的作物花费更多时间，请记得一定要使用它，尤其是你有了水栽托盘之后！
Texts.Eng: Without fertilizer you'll have a tougher time making and growing plants. It is especially useful in a Hydroponics tray!

Texts.Chs: 你的研究会需要到大量的硫酸铵，没有它，你将无法生产出更高品质的肥料！
Texts.Eng: You'll need a fair amount of Ammonium Sulfate in your lab work. Without it you'll be unable to produce high-quality fertilizers!

Texts.Chs: 看来你发现了一些骨头。虽然它有些粗糙和原始，但它却可以制造出各种有用的物质，例如武器或护甲。
Texts.Eng: You've found some bone. While somewhat grisly and primitive it can still produce various useful goods including weapons and armor.
